title: Social Media Analytics in Real Time with MarkLogic Server for Product Surveillance, Fraud Detection and Liability Discovery
abstract: If you're in the world of risk management, whether in Financial Services, the Government, CPG & Retail or Healthcare, this session is for you. Here we do a deep-dive of the capabilities of MarkLogic Server that makes it a powerful tool in the war against fraud, waste and misuse. Learn with practical examples how companies today are leveraging real-time social media analytics to minimize exposure to internal and external threats â€“ including the unknown ones.  We'll conclude with a section on how you can use the same core capabilities for a more accurate analysis of voice-of-the-customer and product sentiment.

surveys.comments: Would like to have gotten to how MarkLogic interacts with SmartLogic sooner.
Very good session-Marklogic should buy smartlogic.
